attributes.action: Sack the Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has now become abundantly clear to the people of this great country that the current Speaker of the Commons is not fulfilling, or is not capable of fulfilling, his duty to protect the public from MP's fraudulent expense claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
